name: Bun Snap
description:
This game was developed from Nov. 17, 2017–Nov. 19, 2017 for the xkcdGameJam, based off the xkcd comic: Bun. Browse the source code here: https://github.com/BlazingMammothGames/xkcdgamejam.

The game is a 3D first-person adventure where you must run around a forest and find buns; taking the best possible pictures of them to score points. Unfortunately, night time is coming soon and you'll have to race against the darkness to get the perfect shot!

Controls:
  • W: Walk Forward
  • A: Strafe Left
  • S: Walk Backward
  • D: Straft Right
  • Shift: Run
  • C: Crouch
  • V / Right Mouse Button: Enable Camera
  • Left Mouse Button: Take Picture / Click
  • Mouse Movement: Aim
